metadata.dc:description: It is reported Dracunculus sp. in a dog from Fontana city, department of Pati√±o, in the Formosa Province, Argentina. This is the fourth report of Dracunculosis occurred in animals all from the same geographic area of Formosa.
metadata.dc:title: Reporte de un caso de dracunculosis en un canino en la provincia de Formosa--Argentina.
[Report of a case of dracunculosis in a dog in the Province of Formosa--Argentina].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista do Instituto de Medicina Tropical de Sao Paulo
